original: mi g-yo bas ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi g-yo bas ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Name and form are supported by consciousness.

original: dbus kyi mtha' nas phyi ma'i mthar 'du byed rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji ltar na 'byung bar 'gyur /üîΩji ltar na 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dbus kyi mtha' nas phyi ma'i mthar 'du byed rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji ltar na 'byung bar 'gyur / ji ltar na 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: How does the dependent origination of compounded phenomena occur from the middle to the end?üîΩHow does it not occur?

original: mi 'byung bas rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mi 'byung bas rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does it not occur and thus become purified?

original: de ltar dbus kyi mthar byung ba'i gang zag des sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu nang gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / yul las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i dbang gis 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar dbus kyi mthar byung ba'i gang zag des sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu nang gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / yul las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i dbang gis 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the person who has arisen in the middle of cyclic existence experiences two kinds of effects, the internal effect of evolution that is the effect of former karma and the effect that arises from objects by the power of feeling.

original: de dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan pa'am /
analyzed: de dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan pa'am /
translated: He hears about what is not the true Dharma

original: sngon goms pa la brten nas /
analyzed: sngon goms pa la brten nas /
translated: or, on the basis of former habituation,

original: 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis la rmongs par 'gyur te /üîΩde nang gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rmongs pas yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa las /
analyzed: 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis la rmongs par 'gyur te / de nang gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rmongs pas yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa las /
translated: he becomes confused about the two kinds of effects.

original: sdug bsngal du yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu mi shes so //
analyzed: sdug bsngal du yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu mi shes so //
translated: Because he is confused about the internal effect of evolution, he does not understand suffering as it truly is in the process of actualizing a new existence.

original: de sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i ma rig pa'i dbang du byas nas snga ma bzhin du 'du byed rnams byed cing sogs so /
analyzed: de sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i ma rig pa'i dbang du byas nas snga ma bzhin du 'du byed rnams byed cing sogs so /
translated: In dependence on the ignorance of the prior limit and the ignorance of the later limit, formations are produced, and so on, as before.

original: // / de'i rnam par shes pa de tshe 'di nyid la gsar du las byed pas las de dang 'brel par 'gyur te /
analyzed: // / de'i rnam par shes pa de tshe 'di nyid la gsar du las byed pas las de dang 'brel par 'gyur te /
translated: That consciousness newly performs action in this life, and so that action is connected with it.

original: de ltar na ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de ltar na ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la /
translated: Thus, in dependence on ignorance, formations occur.

original: 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In dependence on formations, consciousness occurs.

original: tshe 'di'i rnam par shes pa de ni ma 'ongs pa na mngon par 'grub pa'i rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir rgyur gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: tshe 'di'i rnam par shes pa de ni ma 'ongs pa na mngon par 'grub pa'i rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir rgyur gyur pa yin no //
translated: That consciousness of this life is the cause because it holds the result of the consciousness that will be actualized in the future.

original: rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi dbang du byas nas rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ces bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi dbang du byas nas rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ces bya ste /
translated: From the perspective of all consciousnesses, there are said to be six collections of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa de yang phyi ma la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa de yang phyi ma la /
translated: That consciousness in the future

original: yang srid pa'i ming dang gzugs kyi sa bon dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //üîΩming dang gzugs kyi sa bon de yang phyi ma la /
analyzed: yang srid pa'i ming dang gzugs kyi sa bon dang 'brel par 'gyur ro // ming dang gzugs kyi sa bon de yang phyi ma la /
translated: and it is connected with the seed of name-and-form in the next existence.

original: yang srid pa'i skye mched drug gi sa bon dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //üîΩskye mched drug gi sa bon de yang phyi ma la /
analyzed: yang srid pa'i skye mched drug gi sa bon dang 'brel par 'gyur ro // skye mched drug gi sa bon de yang phyi ma la /
translated: And that seed of name-and-form is connected with the seed of the six sense bases in the next existence.

original: yang srid pa'i reg pa'i sa bon dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //üîΩ@102b reg pa'i sa bon de yang phyi ma la /
analyzed: yang srid pa'i reg pa'i sa bon dang 'brel par 'gyur ro // @102b reg pa'i sa bon de yang phyi ma la /
translated: And that seed of the six sense bases is connected with the seed of contact in the next existence.

original: yang srid pa'i tshor ba'i sa bon dang 'brel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang srid pa'i tshor ba'i sa bon dang 'brel bar 'gyur te /
translated: And that seed of contact is connected with the seed of feeling in the next existence.

original: 'di ni dbus kyi mtha' la gnas shing /
analyzed: 'di ni dbus kyi mtha' la gnas shing /
translated: This is the middle limit,

original: yang sred pa 'phen pa'i rgyu yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: yang sred pa 'phen pa'i rgyu yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: and it should be known as the cause of projecting craving for a new existence.

original: des na rnam par shes pa la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: des na rnam par shes pa la sogs pa nas /
translated: Therefore, from consciousness up to feeling,

original: tshor ba la thug pa'i bar dag gi lus mtha' dag 'phen par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba la thug pa'i bar dag gi lus mtha' dag 'phen par 'gyur ro //
translated: the entire body is projected.

original: de rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rmongs pa snga mas de ltar yang srid pas 'phangs nas /
analyzed: de rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rmongs pa snga mas de ltar yang srid pas 'phangs nas /
translated: When that previous ignorance about the ripened result has thus projected a new existence,

original: yul las skyes pa'i 'bras bu la rmongs pa cig shos kyis /
analyzed: yul las skyes pa'i 'bras bu la rmongs pa cig shos kyis /
translated: The other, who is confused about the result born from the object,

original: yul gyi tshor ba la dmigs nas sred pa skyed par byed do //
analyzed: yul gyi tshor ba la dmigs nas sred pa skyed par byed do //
translated: having observed the feeling of the object, generates craving.

original: sred pa des 'dod pa yongs su tshol ba'am /
analyzed: sred pa des 'dod pa yongs su tshol ba'am /
translated: By that craving, he seeks sensual pleasure or

original: srid pa yongs su tshol bar byed pa na /
analyzed: srid pa yongs su tshol bar byed pa na /
translated: he seeks existence.

original: 'dod pa'i len pa'am /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i len pa'am /
translated: He takes up the grasping of sensual pleasure or

original: srid pa'i len pa'am /
analyzed: srid pa'i len pa'am /
translated: the grasping of existence or

original: lta ba dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / bdag tu smra ba len par byed do //
analyzed: lta ba dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / bdag tu smra ba len par byed do //
translated: the grasping of the view, morality and spiritual disciplines, and the grasping of self-theories.

original: len pa blangs nas kyang /
analyzed: len pa blangs nas kyang /
translated: Having taken up grasping,

original: sred pa dang len pa lhan cig phrad pa na /
analyzed: sred pa dang len pa lhan cig phrad pa na /
translated: when craving and grasping come together,

original: 'phen pa'i rgyu snga ma la srid pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'phen pa'i rgyu snga ma la srid pa zhes bya'o //
translated: the former projecting cause is called ‚Äúexistence.‚ÄùüîΩAfter existence, having gathered the causes for the actualization of birth,

original: skye ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyur bsdus pa'i srid pa'i rjes la 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /üîΩji ltar 'phangs pa'i 'phen pa'i rgyus rnam par shes pa la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: skye ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyur bsdus pa'i srid pa'i rjes la 'chi ba'i dus byas nas / ji ltar 'phangs pa'i 'phen pa'i rgyus rnam par shes pa la sogs pa nas /
translated: at the time of death,üîΩthe formations from consciousness up to feeling, projected by the projecting cause,

original: tshor ba la thug pa'i 'du byed rnams rim ma ma cig car 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: tshor ba la thug pa'i 'du byed rnams rim ma ma cig car 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: arise in succession.

original: de ltar tshe 'di la ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
analyzed: de ltar tshe 'di la ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
translated: In this way, in this life, craving arises due to the condition of feeling that arises from the contact of ignorance.

original: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
analyzed: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
translated: Grasping arises due to the condition of craving.

original: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
analyzed: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
translated: Becoming arises due to the condition of grasping.

original: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
analyzed: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
translated: Birth arises due to the condition of becoming.

original: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bye brag rnams /
analyzed: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bye brag rnams /
translated: Due to the condition of birth, the various sufferings of aging, sickness, death, and so on arise.

original: skye ba'i gnas kha cig tu mngon du 'gyur la /
analyzed: skye ba'i gnas kha cig tu mngon du 'gyur la /
translated: In some places of birth, they manifest.

original: kha cig tu ni sa bon gyi rjes su 'brel par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: kha cig tu ni sa bon gyi rjes su 'brel par rig par bya ste /
translated: In some, they should be known to be related to the seeds.

original: de ltar na dbus kyi mthar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams dang / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa la brten nas /
analyzed: de ltar na dbus kyi mthar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams dang / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa la brten nas /
translated: In this way, based on the condition of ignorance giving rise to formations in the middle and the condition of feeling giving rise to craving,

original: phyi ma'i mthar 'du byed rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi ma'i mthar 'du byed rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: in the future, formations will arise.

original: gal te tshe 'di la gzhan gyi sgra'am /
analyzed: gal te tshe 'di la gzhan gyi sgra'am /
translated: If, in this life, based on the words of others

original: sngon gyi tshogs la brten nas /
analyzed: sngon gyi tshogs la brten nas /
translated: or based on previous accumulations,

original: 'bras bur gyur pa 'du byed rnam pa gnyis la de dag gi rgyu dang / de dag gi 'gog pa dang / de dag 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam tshul bzhin yid la byed na /
analyzed: 'bras bur gyur pa 'du byed rnam pa gnyis la de dag gi rgyu dang / de dag gi 'gog pa dang / de dag 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam tshul bzhin yid la byed na /
translated: When one properly attends to the cause of those formations, to their cessation, and to the path that leads to their cessation,

original: des tshul bzhin yid la byas pa'i rgyus @103a * //
analyzed: des tshul bzhin yid la byas pa'i rgyus @103a * //
translated: then, due to the cause of proper attention,

original: yang dag par lta ba skyed de /
analyzed: yang dag par lta ba skyed de /
translated: one generates right view.

original: bden pa rnams la rim gyis slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bden pa rnams la rim gyis slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One then gradually trains in the truths and attains the pure knowledge and vision of the trainees and the non-trainees.

original: des shes pa mthong ba des na ma rig pa dang / sred pa de ma lus par spong ngo //
analyzed: des shes pa mthong ba des na ma rig pa dang / sred pa de ma lus par spong ngo //
translated: Through that knowledge and vision, one completely abandons ignorance and craving.

original: de spangs na de la dmigs pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa de spangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de spangs na de la dmigs pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa de spangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: When that is abandoned, one also abandons the feeling that arises from the contact of ignorance and the proper non-knowledge of the object, which is the cause of that.

original: de spangs pas kyang tshe 'di la ma rig pa dang bral nas shes rab rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de spangs pas kyang tshe 'di la ma rig pa dang bral nas shes rab rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: By abandoning that, one becomes free from ignorance in this life and actualizes the liberation of wisdom.

original: ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sred pa dang / 'dod chags gang yin pa'i sems de dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sred pa dang / 'dod chags gang yin pa'i sems de dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, when ignorance is eliminated, the formations that begin with consciousness and end with feeling, which would arise if ignorance were not eliminated, do not arise in the future.üîΩThey are not subject to arising.üîΩTherefore, when ignorance is eliminated, the formations that begin with consciousness and end with feeling, which would arise if ignorance were not eliminated, do not arise in the future.üîΩThey are not subject to arising.üîΩTherefore, when ignorance is eliminated, the formations that begin with consciousness and end with feeling, which would arise if ignorance were not eliminated, do not arise in the future.üîΩThey are not subject to arising.

analyzed: ma rig pa de 'gags pas ma rig pa ma spangs na rnam par shes pa la sogs pa nas tshor ba la thug pa'i 'du byed rnams skye bar 'gyur ba de dag phyi ma'i mtha' las brtsams te skye bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, when ignorance is eliminated, the formations that begin with consciousness and end with feeling, which would arise if ignorance were not eliminated, do not arise in the future.

analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i bar du 'gag par 'gyur zhes bya'o //
translated: They are not subject to arising.üîΩTherefore

original: tshe 'di la ma rig pa 'gags pas /
analyzed: tshe 'di la ma rig pa 'gags pas /
translated: In this life, due to the cessation of ignorance,

original: ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag / ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa 'gags pas ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag / ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag / sred
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag / ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa 'gags pas ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag / ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag / sred
translated: the contact that is the coming together of ignorance ceases, due to the cessation of the contact that is the coming together of ignorance, the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of ignorance ceases, due to the cessation of the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of ignorance, craving ceases,

original: pa 'gags pas snga ma bzhin du mi skye ba'i chos nyid kyis len pa la sogs pa nas 'khrug pa la thug pa'i 'du byed rnams 'gag ces bya'o //
analyzed: pa 'gags pas snga ma bzhin du mi skye ba'i chos nyid kyis len pa la sogs pa nas 'khrug pa la thug pa'i 'du byed rnams 'gag ces bya'o //
translated: due to the cessation of craving, as before, the dharmas that are not produced by the reality of non-arising, such as grasping, are ceased, up to the cessation of the formations that are the coming together of ignorance.

original: de ltar na tshe 'di la 'du byed de dag 'jug par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de ltar na tshe 'di la 'du byed de dag 'jug par mi 'gyur la /
translated: Thus, in this life, those formations do not engage.

original: tshe 'di la mi 'jug pas tshe 'di la phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: tshe 'di la mi 'jug pas tshe 'di la phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur te /
translated: Since they do not engage in this life, in this life, they attain nirvana in the realm of nirvana that has the remainder of the aggregates.

original: de'i tshe de'i rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang @103b gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i lhag ma yod de /
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang @103b gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i lhag ma yod de /
translated: At that time, due to the condition of consciousness, name and form exist, and due to the condition of name and form, the remaining consciousnesses exist.

original: yongs su dag cing yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su dag cing yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They become completely pure and completely cleansed.

original: de'i lus rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa ji srid du gnas pa de srid du bral nas tshor ba myong bar 'gyur gyi ldan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i lus rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa ji srid du gnas pa de srid du bral nas tshor ba myong bar 'gyur gyi ldan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: As long as the body with consciousness remains, for that long, being separated, one experiences feelings, but not being conjoined.

original: de'i lus rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa de yang sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i tshe ji tsam pa de srid gnas te /
analyzed: de'i lus rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa de yang sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i tshe ji tsam pa de srid gnas te /
translated: Moreover, that body with consciousness remains for as long as the lifespan projected by previous karma lasts.

original: gang gi tshe de'i tshe zad pa na rnam par shes pas zin pa'i lus spong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de'i tshe zad pa na rnam par shes pas zin pa'i lus spong bar 'gyur te /
translated: When at that time the lifespan is exhausted, the body that is conjoined with consciousness is abandoned.

original: srog gi dbang po 'di phan chad kyi de'i srog gi dbang po yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: srog gi dbang po 'di phan chad kyi de'i srog gi dbang po yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing /
translated: From this point onward, the faculty of life force of that being is exhausted.

original: phyis rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyis rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Later, it will not ripen.

original: rnam par shes pa de yang 'dir tshor ba thams cad dang bcas par rang gi ngang gis 'gags la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa de yang 'dir tshor ba thams cad dang bcas par rang gi ngang gis 'gags la /
translated: Moreover, consciousness here is naturally arrested together with all feelings.

original: sngar rgyu 'gags pas gzhan du nying mtshams sbyor ba med cing ma lus par 'gags pa yin no //
analyzed: sngar rgyu 'gags pas gzhan du nying mtshams sbyor ba med cing ma lus par 'gags pa yin no //
translated: Since the previous cause has ceased, there is no further rebirth, and it is arrested without remainder.

original: de ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings shin tu zhi ba'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: de ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings shin tu zhi ba'i gnas yin te /
translated: This is the extremely peaceful realm of nirvana without remainder of the aggregates.

original: gang gi don du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' tshangs par spyad pa bsten pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi don du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' tshangs par spyad pa bsten pa'o //
translated: This is the purpose for which one approaches nirvana in the presence of the BhagavƒÅn and practices pure conduct to the end of nirvana.

original: de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
translated: Thus, the presentation of dependent origination

original: sngon gyi mtha' nas dbus kyi mthar 'jug pa dang / dbus kyi mtha' nas phyi ma'i mthar 'jug pa dang / dbus kyi mthar 'jug pa rnam par dag pa rnam pa gsum gyis rgyas par bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' nas dbus kyi mthar 'jug pa dang / dbus kyi mtha' nas phyi ma'i mthar 'jug pa dang / dbus kyi mthar 'jug pa rnam par dag pa rnam pa gsum gyis rgyas par bstan pa yin te /
translated: is explained extensively in three ways: engagement from the prior limit to the middle limit, engagement from the middle limit to the later limit, and the purification of engagement in the middle limit.

original: 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lus yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lus yin no //
translated: This is the body of dependent origination.

original: sgo gang zhe na /
analyzed: sgo gang zhe na /
translated: What are the doors?

original: sgo rnam pa brgyad kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgo rnam pa brgyad kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: Dependent origination is entered through eight doors:

original: nang gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i sgo dang / phyi rol gyi lo tog 'grub pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba'i sgo dang / snod kyi 'jig rten 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i sgo dang / zas kyis nye bar bsten pa'i sgo dang /üîΩlas bdag gir bya ba'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: nang gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i sgo dang / phyi rol gyi lo tog 'grub pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba'i sgo dang / snod kyi 'jig rten 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i sgo dang / zas kyis nye bar bsten pa'i sgo dang / las bdag gir bya ba'i dbang du byas te /
translated: the door of the arising of internal consciousness, the door of the production of external crops, the door of the death and rebirth of the world of sentient beings, the door of the destruction and evolution of the receptacle world, the door of the support of sentient beings by food,

original: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i las dang / de dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod pa'i sgo dang / mthu'i sgo dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgo'o //üîΩrten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i @104a * //
analyzed: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i las dang / de dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod pa'i sgo dang / mthu'i sgo dang / rnam par byang ba'i sgo'o // rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i @104a * //
translated: the door of the experience of the results of actions, the door of the power of action, and the door of purification.

original: don gang zhe na /
analyzed: don gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of dependent origination?

original: sems can med pa'i don ni /
analyzed: sems can med pa'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of non-sentient being,

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don de sems can med pa yin na mi rtag pa'i don to //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don de sems can med pa yin na mi rtag pa'i don to //
translated: If the meaning of dependent origination is the non-existence of sentient beings, it is the meaning of impermanence.

original: mi rtag pa yin na ring po mi thogs pa nye bar gnas pa'i don to //
analyzed: mi rtag pa yin na ring po mi thogs pa nye bar gnas pa'i don to //
translated: If it is impermanent, it is the meaning of not remaining for a long time.

original: ring po mi thogs pa nye bar gnas pa yin na gzhan gyi dbang gi don to //
analyzed: ring po mi thogs pa nye bar gnas pa yin na gzhan gyi dbang gi don to //
translated: If it does not remain for a long time, it is the meaning of being dependent on another.

original: gzhan gyi dbang yin na byed pa med pa'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang yin na byed pa med pa'i don to //
translated: If it is dependent on another, it is the meaning of being without an agent.

original: byed pa med pa'i don yin na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don to //
analyzed: byed pa med pa'i don yin na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don to //
translated: If it is the meaning of being without an agent, it is the meaning of the uninterrupted continuum of cause and effect.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyun mi 'chad pa yin na mthun par rgyu dang 'bras bu 'jug pa'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyun mi 'chad pa yin na mthun par rgyu dang 'bras bu 'jug pa'i don to //
translated: If the continuum of cause and effect is uninterrupted, it is the meaning of the engagement of cause and effect in accordance with each other.

original: mthun par rgyu dang 'bras bu 'jug pa'i don yin na las bdag gir bya ba'i don gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to //
analyzed: mthun par rgyu dang 'bras bu 'jug pa'i don yin na las bdag gir bya ba'i don gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to //
translated: If the meaning of the engagement of cause and effect in accordance with each other, it is the meaning of dependent origination by the meaning of appropriating karma.

original: don gang yongs su bstan pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag ce na /
analyzed: don gang yongs su bstan pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag ce na /
translated: For the sake of which meaning is dependent origination presented?

original: smras pa / rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyis rang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i don yongs su bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: smras pa / rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyis rang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i don yongs su bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He replied: ‚ÄúIn order to teach the meaning of affliction and purification through causes and conditions.

original: rnam par dbye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba gang zhe na /
translated: ‚Äù What is the analysis?

original: sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa gang yin pa zhes mdo las rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa gang yin pa zhes mdo las rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: As it is said in the sutra, ‚ÄúThe non-understanding of the prior limit.

original: de la sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: ‚Äù What is the non-understanding of the prior limit?

original: 'das pa'i 'du byed rnams la tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i ste /
analyzed: 'das pa'i 'du byed rnams la tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i ste /
translated: It is the non-understanding of past formations through incorrect mental application.

original: ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam /
analyzed: ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam /
translated: ‚ÄúDid I exist in the past?

original: 'on te bdag 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig / bdag cir gyur pa zhig / bdag ji lta bur gyur ba zhig snyam pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te bdag 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig / bdag cir gyur pa zhig / bdag ji lta bur gyur ba zhig snyam pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Or did I not exist in the past? What was I in the past? How was I in the past? ‚Äù

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the non-understanding of the future?

original: ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed rnams la tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i ste /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed rnams la tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i ste /
translated: It is the non-understanding of future formations through incorrect mental application.

original: ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
translated: ‚ÄúWill I exist in the future?

original: 'on te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig / bdag cir 'gyur ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur snyam pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig / bdag cir 'gyur ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur snyam pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Or else, Will I exist in the future? Will I not exist in the future? What will I be in the future? How will I be in the future?

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa gang zhe na /üîΩnang du tshul bzhin ma yin par the tshom can gyi tshul gyis ci zhig yod /üîΩcir 'gyur / sems can 'di dag gang nas 'ongs /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa gang zhe na / nang du tshul bzhin ma yin par the tshom can gyi tshul gyis ci zhig yod / cir 'gyur / sems can 'di dag gang nas 'ongs /
translated: What is ignorance about the past and the future?üîΩIt is ignorance as to the past, thinking: Did I exist in the past? Did I not exist in the past? What was I in the past? How was I in the past?

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is ignorance as to the future, thinking: Will I exist in the future? Will I not exist in the future? What will I be in the future? How will I be in the future?

original: nang mi shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: nang mi shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is ignorance about the internal?

original: @104b so sor rang gi 'du byed rnams la tshul bzhin ma yin par bdag tu yid la byed pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: @104b so sor rang gi 'du byed rnams la tshul bzhin ma yin par bdag tu yid la byed pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is ignorance as to one's own formations, thinking: ‚ÄúThere is a self in me.‚Äù

original: phyi rol mi shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: phyi rol mi shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is ignorance about the external?

original: phyi rol gyi 'du byed sems can du ston pa ma yin pa rnams la bdag gi bar tshul bzhin ma yin par yid la byed pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi 'du byed sems can du ston pa ma yin pa rnams la bdag gi bar tshul bzhin ma yin par yid la byed pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the ignorance of considering as one's own what is not a sentient being, namely, external formations.

original: nang dang phyi rol mi shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: nang dang phyi rol mi shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is ignorance of the internal and the external?

original: pha rol gyi rgyud la yod pa'i 'du byed rnams la mdza' bshes dang / dgra dang / tha mal par tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol gyi rgyud la yod pa'i 'du byed rnams la mdza' bshes dang / dgra dang / tha mal par tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the ignorance of considering as friend, enemy, or stranger the formations which exist in the stream of another.

original: las mi shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: las mi shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is ignorance of action?

original: las kyi byed pa por tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi byed pa por tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the ignorance of considering the agent as real.

original: rnam par smin pa mi shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa mi shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is ignorance of the results of action?

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur bsdus pa'i 'du byed rnams la tshor ba por tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur bsdus pa'i 'du byed rnams la tshor ba por tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the ignorance of considering the experiencer as real with regard to formations included in the results of action.

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa mi shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa mi shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is ignorance of the ripening of results?üîΩIt is the ignorance of considering the experiencer as real with regard to formations included in the results of ripening.

original: las dang de'i 'bras bu phyin ci log par tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: las dang de'i 'bras bu phyin ci log par tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is ignorance of the retribution of action and of the means of avoiding it.

original: sangs rgyas mi shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mi shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is ignorance of the Buddha?

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub yid la mi byed pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub yid la mi byed pa'am /
translated: It is ignorance of the enlightenment of the Buddhas.üîΩIt is the non-attention to the Buddha,

translated: wrong attention,

translated: negligence,

translated: doubt,

translated: and denial.

translated: What is ignorance of the Dharma?

translated: It is the non-attention to the Dharma,

translated: wrong attention,

analyzed: bag med pa'am /

translated: doubt,

analyzed: skur ba 'debs pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: and denial.

original: dge 'dun mi shes pa gang zhe na /

translated: What is ignorance of the Sa·πÖgha?

original: dge 'dun gyis legs par bsgrubs pa yid la mi byed pa'am /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis legs par bsgrubs pa yid la mi byed pa'am /
translated: It is the non-attention to the good order of the Sa·πÖgha,

original: sdug bsngal mi shes pa gang zhe na /

original: sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du yid la mi byed pa'am /
analyzed: sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du yid la mi byed pa'am /
translated: It is the non-attention to suffering as suffering,

translated: or the wrong attention to it,üîΩor the lack of attention due to heedlessness,

translated: or the doubt,

translated: or the denial which is ignorance.

original: sdug bsngal la ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: sdug bsngal la ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: As it is with suffering,

original: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam @105a * //üîΩmi shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam @105a * // mi shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: so it is with the origin, the cessation and the path.

original: rgyu mi shes pa gang zhe na /üîΩrgyu med bar rtog ba'am /
analyzed: rgyu mi shes pa gang zhe na / rgyu med bar rtog ba'am /
translated: What is ignorance of cause?üîΩIt is the non-comprehension of the absence of a creator,

original: mi mthun pa'i rgyu dang / dbang phyug dang / rang bzhin dang / skyes bu gzhan la sogs par tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i rgyu dang / dbang phyug dang / rang bzhin dang / skyes bu gzhan la sogs par tshul bzhin ma yin par rtog pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: and the wrong comprehension of the cause as a creator, as God, as Nature, as Purusha, etc.

original: rgyu ji lta bar rgyu las byung ba'i 'du byed rnams la yang de bzhin te /
analyzed: rgyu ji lta bar rgyu las byung ba'i 'du byed rnams la yang de bzhin te /
translated: As it is with the cause, so it is with the formations which arise from the cause.

original: de dag ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir dge ba'o //
analyzed: de dag ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir dge ba'o //
translated: They are good because they are free from the reproach of the world.

original: de dag ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i phyir mi dge ba'o //
analyzed: de dag ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i phyir mi dge ba'o //
translated: They are unwholesome because they are reprehensible.

original: phan pa'i phyir brten par bya ba'o //
analyzed: phan pa'i phyir brten par bya ba'o //

original: gzhan yang mi shes pa rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang mi shes pa rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: There are also five kinds of ignorance:

original: don la rmongs pa dang / lta ba la rmongs pa dang / bag med pas rmongs pa dang / de kho na'i don la rmongs pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rmongs pa'o //
analyzed: don la rmongs pa dang / lta ba la rmongs pa dang / bag med pas rmongs pa dang / de kho na'i don la rmongs pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rmongs pa'o //
translated: ignorance of meaning, ignorance of views, ignorance of heedlessness, ignorance of the meaning of reality, and ignorance of pride.
