analyzed: mi shes pa rnam pa bcu dgu po gang yin pa dang / @105b rnam pa lnga po gang yin pa de la /
translated: Among the nineteen kinds of ignorance and the five kinds,

original: gang gis gang bsdus par blta bar bya zhe na lta ba la rmongs pa ni /
analyzed: gang gis gang bsdus par blta bar bya zhe na lta ba la rmongs pa ni /
translated: what should be understood as included in what?

original: dang po'i drug dang / rgyu las byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa bsdus par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: dang po'i drug dang / rgyu las byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa bsdus par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Ignorance of views is included in the first six kinds of ignorance.

original: bag med pas rmongs pas ni las dang rnam par smin pa dang de gnyi ga mi shes pa bsdus so //
analyzed: bag med pas rmongs pas ni las dang rnam par smin pa dang de gnyi ga mi shes pa bsdus so //
translated: Ignorance of heedlessness includes ignorance of action, ignorance of ripening, and ignorance of both.

original: de kho na'i don la rmongs pas ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa nas lam gyi bden pa la thug pa rnams mi shes pa bsdus so //
analyzed: de kho na'i don la rmongs pas ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa nas lam gyi bden pa la thug pa rnams mi shes pa bsdus so //
translated: Ignorance of the meaning of reality includes ignorance of the Buddha, etc., up to ignorance of the truth of the path.

original: mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rmongs pas ni tha ma bsdus so //
analyzed: mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rmongs pas ni tha ma bsdus so //
translated: Ignorance of pride includes the last kind of ignorance.

original: don la rmongs pas ni thams cad bsdus par blta bar bya'o //üîΩmi shes pa dang / ma mthong ba dang / mngon par ma rtogs pa dang / mun pa dang / rmongs pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa zhes bya ba ma rig pa'i rnam pa'i rnam grangs drug po 'di dag ni rmongs pa'i gzhi rnam pa bdun po dag dang /
analyzed: don la rmongs pas ni thams cad bsdus par blta bar bya'o // mi shes pa dang / ma mthong ba dang / mngon par ma rtogs pa dang / mun pa dang / rmongs pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa zhes bya ba ma rig pa'i rnam pa'i rnam grangs drug po 'di dag ni rmongs pa'i gzhi rnam pa bdun po dag dang /
translated: One should understand that the term ‚Äúdelusion‚Äù includes all of them.üîΩIgnorance, non-vision, non-realization, darkness, delusion, and the darkness of ignorance are the six synonyms for ignorance.

original: rim bzhin du sbyar bar blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: rim bzhin du sbyar bar blta bar bya ste /
translated: One should understand that these six synonyms are applied in order to the seven bases of delusion.

original: rmongs pa'i gzhi tha ma gnyis /
analyzed: rmongs pa'i gzhi tha ma gnyis /
translated: The last two bases of delusion

original: gzhi gcig tu byas pa ni tha ma'i ma rig pa'i mun pa'i rnam grangs de'i nang du bsdu bar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhi gcig tu byas pa ni tha ma'i ma rig pa'i mun pa'i rnam grangs de'i nang du bsdu bar blta bar bya'o //
translated: are combined into one base, and one should understand that they are included in the last synonym, the darkness of ignorance.

original: rnam grangs gzhan yang thos pa las byung ba dang / bsams pa las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis /
analyzed: rnam grangs gzhan yang thos pa las byung ba dang / bsams pa las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis /
translated: There is another classification: the counteragents to the wisdom that arises from listening, reflection, and meditation

original: rnam grangs gsum po dang rim bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam grangs gsum po dang rim bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: are the three synonyms in order.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa de nyid la /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa de nyid la /
translated: The counteragents

original: chung ngu dang / 'bring dang chen po yod pas na /
analyzed: chung ngu dang / 'bring dang chen po yod pas na /
translated: small, medium, and great.

original: rnam grangs phyi ma gsum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam grangs phyi ma gsum du 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, there are three more categories.

original: de ltar na mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rab tu dbye ba dang / ngo bo nyid kyi rab tu dbye bas rnam grangs drug tu 'gyur ro /üîΩ// / bam po bcu pa /
analyzed: de ltar na mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rab tu dbye ba dang / ngo bo nyid kyi rab tu dbye bas rnam grangs drug tu 'gyur ro / // / bam po bcu pa /
translated: Thus, there are six categories of the resistances: categories of the resistances, and categories of their intrinsic natures.

original: lus kyi 'du byed rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: lus kyi 'du byed rnams gang zhe na /
translated: What are the bodily volitions?

original: lus kyi las 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi las 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa ste /
translated: They are bodily actions in the realm of desire and the realm of form.

original: 'og ma'i bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin par grags pa dang / gong ma'i mi g-yo bar grags pa'o//
analyzed: 'og ma'i bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin par grags pa dang / gong ma'i mi g-yo bar grags pa'o//
translated: They are known as meritorious and demeritorious in the lower realms, and known as immovable in the higher realms.

original: ngag gi 'du byed rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: ngag gi 'du byed rnams gang zhe na /
translated: What are the verbal volitions?

original: ngag gi las te /
analyzed: ngag gi las te /
translated: They are verbal actions.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: The rest should be understood as above.

original: yid kyi 'du byed rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: yid kyi 'du byed rnams gang zhe na /
translated: What are the mental volitions?

original: yid kyi las te /
analyzed: yid kyi las te /
translated: They are mental actions.

original: de yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa ste /
translated: Moreover, those in the realm of desire are meritorious and demeritorious.

original: mi g-yo ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba ni ma yin no //
translated: They are not immovable.

original: khams gong ma @106a * //
analyzed: khams gong ma @106a * //
translated: In the higher realms,

original: gnyis kyi ni mi g-yo ba nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis kyi ni mi g-yo ba nyid do //
translated: The second is the stability of the mind.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa gang zhe na /üîΩphyi ma la mig gi dbang po la brten cing /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa gang zhe na / phyi ma la mig gi dbang po la brten cing /
translated: What is visual consciousness?

original: gzugs so sor rnam par rig pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: gzugs so sor rnam par rig pa gang yin pa de /
translated: It is the consciousness which, in the future, will be supported by the eye sense-faculty and which will perceive visible form.

original: bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / mi g-yo bas yongs su bsgos pa sa bon du gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin ba dang / sa bon de las byung ba 'bras bur gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / mi g-yo bas yongs su bsgos pa sa bon du gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin ba dang / sa bon de las byung ba 'bras bur gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the consciousness which is impregnated by merit, demerit, or stability, and which is the seed. It is also the result which proceeds from this seed.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ji lta bar /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ji lta bar /
translated: As is visual consciousness,

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams kyang ci rigs par blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams kyang ci rigs par blta bar bya ste /
translated: so are auditory, olfactory, gustatory, tactile and mental consciousnesses.

original: rten dang / yul las de dag gi so sor rnam par rig pa'i bye brag blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: rten dang / yul las de dag gi so sor rnam par rig pa'i bye brag blta bar bya'o //
translated: They are distinguished by their support and by the object-field.

original: de yang 'dod ba na spyod pa ni rnam pa drug go //
analyzed: de yang 'dod ba na spyod pa ni rnam pa drug go //
translated: Moreover, in the realm of desire, it is of six types;

original: gzugs na spyod pa ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: in the realm of fine-materiality, it is of four types;

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni rnam pa gcig bu'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni rnam pa gcig bu'o //
translated: The formless realm is one type.

original: tshor ba'i phung po gang zhe na /
analyzed: tshor ba'i phung po gang zhe na /
translated: What is the aggregate of feeling?

original: thams cad kyang myong ba'i rnam pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad kyang myong ba'i rnam pa yin te /
translated: It is the experience of all that is pleasant, unpleasant, or neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: de yang khams gsum char na spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang khams gsum char na spyod pa yin no //
translated: It is found in the three realms.

original: 'du shes kyi phung po gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi phung po gang zhe na /
translated: What is the aggregate of perception?

original: thams cad kyang shes pa'i rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyang shes pa'i rnam pa yin no //
translated: It is the perception of all that is pleasant, unpleasant, or neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: 'du byed kyi phung po gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po gang zhe na /
translated: What is the aggregate of formations?

original: thams cad kyang sems mngon par 'du byed pa yid kyi las kyi rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyang sems mngon par 'du byed pa yid kyi las kyi rnam pa yin no //
translated: It is the mental activity associated with all that is pleasant, unpleasant, or neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po gang zhe na /
translated: What is the aggregate of consciousness?

original: thams cad kyang rnam par rig pa'i rnam pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad kyang rnam par rig pa'i rnam pa yin te /
translated: It is the consciousness of all that is pleasant, unpleasant, or neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: phung po 'di dag khams gsum char na spyod pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: phung po 'di dag khams gsum char na spyod pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: These aggregates should be understood as being found in the three realms.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four great elements?

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams te /
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams te /
translated: They are the earth element, the water element, the fire element, and the wind element.

original: de dag ni khams gnyis na yod do //
analyzed: de dag ni khams gnyis na yod do //
translated: They are found in the two realms.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs gang zhe na /
translated: What is form derived from the four great elements?

original: gzugs can gyi skye mched bcu dang / chos kyi skye mched du gtogs pa'i gzugs te /
analyzed: gzugs can gyi skye mched bcu dang / chos kyi skye mched du gtogs pa'i gzugs te /
translated: It is the ten bases of form and the form included in the sense-sphere of mental objects.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs bcu dang / btags pa'i yod pa'i chos kyi skye mched kyi gzugs dang / gzugs na spyod pa brgyad dang / chos kyi skye mched du gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs bcu dang / btags pa'i yod pa'i chos kyi skye mched kyi gzugs dang / gzugs na spyod pa brgyad dang / chos kyi skye mched du gtogs pa'o //
translated: It is the ten forms pertaining to the realm of desire, the form pertaining to the sense-sphere of mental objects which is a nominal reality, the eight forms pertaining to the realm of fine-materiality and the form included in the sense-sphere of mental objects.

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: It is twofold:

original: rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyis yongs su zin pa sa bon du gyur pa dang / des mngon par bsgrubs pa 'bras bur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyis yongs su zin pa sa bon du gyur pa dang / des mngon par bsgrubs pa 'bras bur gyur pa'o //
translated: that which is a seed, being seized by the seed of consciousness, and that which is a result, being actualized by it.

original: mig gi skye mched gang zhe na /
analyzed: mig gi skye mched gang zhe na /
translated: What is the eye-base?

original: @106b mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten po gzugs dang pa ste /
analyzed: @106b mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten po gzugs dang pa ste /
translated: It is the support of the visual consciousness.

original: gang gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang / lta ba dang lta bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang / lta ba dang lta bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is that by means of which one sees visible forms, that which is seeing and that which is the visible form.

original: mig gi skye mched ji lta bar rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin du ci rigs par blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: mig gi skye mched ji lta bar rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin du ci rigs par blta bar bya ste /
translated: The sense-fields of the ear, nose, tongue, body and mental organ should be understood in the same way as the sense-field of sight, according to the case.

original: thams cad kyang dus gsum du bstan pas /
analyzed: thams cad kyang dus gsum du bstan pas /
translated: All of them are taught in the three times.

original: las bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: las bstan par bya'o //
translated: The teaching of action should be understood.

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis te ming dang gzugs kyi sa bon gyis yongs su zin pa sa bon du gyur pa dang / des mngon par bsgrubs pas 'bras bur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis te ming dang gzugs kyi sa bon gyis yongs su zin pa sa bon du gyur pa dang / des mngon par bsgrubs pas 'bras bur gyur pa ste /
translated: Moreover, it is twofold: that which is in the form of a seed, being possessed of the seed of name-and-form, and that which is in the form of a fruit, being accomplished by that.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa ni lnga'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa ni lnga'o //
translated: The five are in the realm of desire and the realm of form.

original: drug pa ni khams gsum char na spyod pa'o //üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: drug pa ni khams gsum char na spyod pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang zhe na /
translated: The sixth is in the three realms.üîΩWhat is visual consciousness?

original: gsum 'dus pa las skyes pa /
analyzed: gsum 'dus pa las skyes pa /
translated: It is the perception of visible form by the eye.

original: yul sdug pa la sogs pa'i don 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: yul sdug pa la sogs pa'i don 'dzin pa ste /
translated: It is the perception of the object, such as the agreeable, etc.

original: de bzhin du reg pa lhag ma rnams kyang so so'i yul gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa las khong du chud par bya'o//
analyzed: de bzhin du reg pa lhag ma rnams kyang so so'i yul gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa las khong du chud par bya'o//
translated: The other forms of consciousness should be understood in the same way, according to the particular object of each.

original: de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: They are also twofold:

original: skye mched drug gi sa bon gyis yongs su zin pa sa bon du gyur pa dang / des mngon par bsgrubs pa 'bras bur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi sa bon gyis yongs su zin pa sa bon du gyur pa dang / des mngon par bsgrubs pa 'bras bur gyur pa ste /
translated: The state of the result is the state of the result of the seed.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa ni thams cad do //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa ni thams cad do //
translated: All of these states exist in the realm of desire.

original: gzugs na spyod pa ni bzhi'o //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa ni bzhi'o //
translated: Four exist in the realm of form.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni gcig go //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni gcig go //
translated: One exists in the formless realm.

original: bde ba'i tshor ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: bde ba'i tshor ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is pleasant feeling?

original: bde ba'i gnas lta bu'i dbang po dang / yul la brten nas sim par tshor ba'i tshor ba'i rnam pa skye ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i gnas lta bu'i dbang po dang / yul la brten nas sim par tshor ba'i tshor ba'i rnam pa skye ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is a pleasant sensation which arises in dependence on a faculty and a.

original: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gang zhe na /üîΩsdug bsngal gyi gnas lta bu'i gnyis po la brten nas /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gang zhe na / sdug bsngal gyi gnas lta bu'i gnyis po la brten nas /
translated: What is unpleasant feeling?

original: sim pa ma yin par tshor ba'i tshor ba'i rnam pa skye ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sim pa ma yin par tshor ba'i tshor ba'i rnam pa skye ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is an unpleasant sensation which arises in dependence on a faculty and an object.

original: sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gang zhe na /üîΩsdug bsngal yang ma yin /
analyzed: sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gang zhe na /üîΩsdug bsngal yang ma yin /
translated: What is neither unpleasant nor pleasant feeling?üîΩIt is a sensation which is neither unpleasant nor pleasant and which arises in dependence on a faculty and an object.

original: bde ba yang ma yin pa'i gnas lta bu'i gnyis po la brten nas sim pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: bde ba yang ma yin pa'i gnas lta bu'i gnyis po la brten nas sim pa yang ma yin /
translated: The third type of sensation is neither pleasant nor unpleasant, like a sensation that is neither soothing nor irritating.

original: sim pa ma yin pa yang ma yin par tshor ba'i tshor ba'i rnam pa skye ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: sim pa ma yin pa yang ma yin par tshor ba'i tshor ba'i rnam pa skye ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: This sensation arises in dependence on the two types of sensation that are either pleasant or unpleasant.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa ni gsum char ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa ni gsum char ro //
translated: Sensation in the realm of desire is of three types.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa man chad na ni gnyis so //üîΩbsam gtan bzhi pa yan chad /üîΩ'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la thug pa man chad na ni /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa man chad na ni gnyis so // bsam gtan bzhi pa yan chad / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la thug pa man chad na ni /
translated: In the first three meditations of the realm of form, there are only two types of sensation,üîΩbecause the sensation of pleasure associated with the five sense consciousnesses is absent there.

original: sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma @107a * //
analyzed: sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma @107a * //
translated: In the fourth meditation and above, up to and including the perception-sphere of neither-conception-nor-non-conception, there is only the sensation that is neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: yin pa'o // tshor ba de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis te reg pa'i sa bon gyis yongs su zin pa sa bon du gyur pa dang / des mngon par bsgrubs pa 'bras bur gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yin pa'o // tshor ba de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis te reg pa'i sa bon gyis yongs su zin pa sa bon du gyur pa dang / des mngon par bsgrubs pa 'bras bur gyur ba'o //
translated: These sensations are of two types: those that are seeds, i.e., those that are taken up by the seeds of contact; and those that are results, i.e., those that are actualized by the seeds.

original: 'dod pa'i sred pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i sred pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is craving for desire?

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la brten nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la don du gnyer ba nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la brten nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la don du gnyer ba nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the afflicted craving for the formations of the desire realm, based on the formations of the desire realm.

original: gang gis 'dod pa'i khams su sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis 'dod pa'i khams su sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pa'o //
translated: It is that by which one actualizes suffering in the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi sred pa gang zhe na /üîΩgzugs na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la brten nas /
analyzed: gzugs kyi sred pa gang zhe na / gzugs na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la brten nas /
translated: What is craving for the form realm?

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la don du gnyer ba nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la don du gnyer ba nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the afflicted craving for the formations of the form realm, based on the formations of the form realm.

original: gang gis gzugs kyi khams su sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis gzugs kyi khams su sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pa'o //
translated: It is that by which one actualizes suffering in the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sred pa gang zhe na /üîΩgzugs med pa na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la brten nas /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sred pa gang zhe na / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la brten nas /
translated: What is craving for the formless realm?üîΩIt is the afflicted craving for the formations of the formless realm, based on the formations of the formless realm.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la don du gnyer ba nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i 'du byed rnams la don du gnyer ba nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is that by which one actualizes suffering in the formless realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams su sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams su sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the cause of the manifestation of suffering in the formless realm.

original: 'dod pa'i len pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i len pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is grasping of desire?

original: 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is desire and attachment to desires.

original: lta ba'i len pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: lta ba'i len pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is grasping of views?

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i lta ba rnams la 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i lta ba rnams la 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is desire and attachment to views other than the view of the transitory collections.

original: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi len pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi len pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is grasping of morality and asceticism?

original: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs log par zhugs pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs log par zhugs pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is desire and attachment to false morality and asceticism.

original: bdag tu smra ba'i len pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: bdag tu smra ba'i len pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is grasping of a doctrine of self?

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba la 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba la 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is desire and attachment to the view of the transitory collections.

original: dang pos ni 'dod pa'i khams nyid kho nar sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed do //
analyzed: dang pos ni 'dod pa'i khams nyid kho nar sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed do //
translated: By the first, suffering is manifested in the desire realm itself.

original: lhag ma rnams kyis ni khams gsum char du'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyis ni khams gsum char du'o //
translated: By the others, it is manifested in the three realms.

original: 'dod pa'i srid pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i srid pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is existence in the realm of desire?

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sngon gyi dus kyi srid pa dang / las kyi srid pa dang / 'chi ba'i srid pa dang / bar ma do'i srid pa dang / skye ba'i srid pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sngon gyi dus kyi srid pa dang / las kyi srid pa dang / 'chi ba'i srid pa dang / bar ma do'i srid pa dang / skye ba'i srid pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags dang /
translated: It is the existence in the realm of desire of the past, the existence of action, the existence of death, the existence in the intermediate state, the existence at birth, the existence of the hells, the animal existence, the ghost existence,

original: lha dang / mi'i srid pa la 'dod pa'i @107b srid pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: lha dang / mi'i srid pa la 'dod pa'i @107b srid pa zhes bya ste /
translated: the divine existence, the human existence.

original: de yang sngon byas pa'i 'du byed dang / nyon mongs pas yongs su zin cing bskyed pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang sngon byas pa'i 'du byed dang / nyon mongs pas yongs su zin cing bskyed pa yin no //
translated: It is also the existence of beings who are born from eggs, from the womb, from moisture, or by spontaneous generation.

original: gzugs kyi srid pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs kyi srid pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is existence in the realm of form?

original: sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags dang / mi'i srid pa ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa ni gzugs kyi srid pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags dang / mi'i srid pa ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa ni gzugs kyi srid pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: It is existence in the realm of form, with the exception of the hells, the animal kingdom, the ghost realm, the gods, and humans.

original: gzugs med pa'i srid pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i srid pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is existence in the formless realm?

original: bar ma do'i srid pa yang ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i srid pas bsdus pa ni gzugs med pa'i srid pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: bar ma do'i srid pa yang ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i srid pas bsdus pa ni gzugs med pa'i srid pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The existence of the intermediate beings is excluded, but the other existences are included in the formless realm.üîΩWhat are the seven existences?

original: srid pa bdun po sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags dang / lha dang / mi dang / las dang / bar ma do'i srid pa rnams gang gi dbang du byas te rnam par gzhag ce na /
analyzed: srid pa bdun po sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags dang / lha dang / mi dang / las dang / bar ma do'i srid pa rnams gang gi dbang du byas te rnam par gzhag ce na /
translated: They are the hells, animals, hungry ghosts, gods, humans, karma, and intermediate existence.

original: dgos pa gsum gyi dbang du byas pa yin te /
analyzed: dgos pa gsum gyi dbang du byas pa yin te /
translated: They are established from the point of view of three needs.

original: gcig ni 'phen pa'i srid pa'o //
analyzed: gcig ni 'phen pa'i srid pa'o //
translated: One is the projecting existence.

original: gcig ni srid pa thob par byed pa'i srid pa'o //
analyzed: gcig ni srid pa thob par byed pa'i srid pa'o //
translated: One is the existence that obtains the existence.

original: lnga ni 'bras bu nye bar spyod pa'i srid pa'o //
analyzed: lnga ni 'bras bu nye bar spyod pa'i srid pa'o //
translated: Five are the existences that enjoy the fruit.

original: skye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: skye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is birth?

original: mngal nas skye ba dang / sgo nga las skye ba'i skye gnas su thog mar mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mngal nas skye ba dang / sgo nga las skye ba'i skye gnas su thog mar mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the first manifestation in the womb or egg.

original: kun tu skye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: kun tu skye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is complete birth?

original: de nyid kyi nang du lus yongs su rdzogs la phyir ma byung ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi nang du lus yongs su rdzogs la phyir ma byung ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the same, when the body is complete and has not yet come out of the womb or egg.

original: phyir 'byung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: phyir 'byung ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the emergence?

original: de nas byung ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de nas byung ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the emergence of that which has already appeared.

original: mngon par 'grub pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mngon par 'grub pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the manifestation?

original: byung nas skye ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: byung nas skye ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the appearance of that which has emerged.

original: 'byung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'byung ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the appearance?

original: drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas su cig car 'byung ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas su cig car 'byung ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the simultaneous appearance of that which is born from the womb and that which is born from moisture.

original: phung po 'thob pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: phung po 'thob pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the acquisition of the aggregates?

original: skye gnas 'di dag nyid dang / gnas skabs rnams su nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dga' 'byung ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: skye gnas 'di dag nyid dang / gnas skabs rnams su nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dga' 'byung ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the appearance of the five aggregates of attachment in the different states of existence.

original: khams 'thob pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: khams 'thob pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the acquisition of the elements?

original: phung po de dag nyid rgyu'i rkyen gyis yongs su zin pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: phung po de dag nyid rgyu'i rkyen gyis yongs su zin pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the five aggregates of attachment which are the cause of the aggregates.

original: skye mched 'thob pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: skye mched 'thob pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the acquisition of the sense spheres?

original: phung po de dag nyid de las gzhan pa'i rkyen gyis yongs su zin pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: phung po de dag nyid de las gzhan pa'i rkyen gyis yongs su zin pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the five aggregates of attachment which are the condition of the sense spheres.

original: phung po mngon par 'grub pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: phung po mngon par 'grub pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the manifestation of the aggregates?

original: phung po de dag nyid nyin gcig bzhin du kha zas kyis brtas shing rgyas par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: phung po de dag nyid nyin gcig bzhin du kha zas kyis brtas shing rgyas par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the daily nourishment of the aggregates by food.

original: srog gi dbang po 'byung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: srog gi dbang po 'byung ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the faculty of life?

original: phung po de dag nyid kyi tshe'i lhag ma'i dbang gis gnas skabs gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: phung po de dag nyid kyi tshe'i lhag ma'i dbang gis gnas skabs gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the duration of the aggregates by the power of the remainder of life.

original: skye ba de'i don mdor bsdu ba gang zhe na /üîΩskye ba'i ngo bo nyid gang @108a * //
analyzed: skye ba de'i don mdor bsdu ba gang zhe na / skye ba'i ngo bo nyid gang @108a * //
translated: What is the summary of birth?

original: yin pa dang / gang du skye ba dang / gang skye ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen gang dag gis yongs su zin pa dang / nye bar rton pas bsgrubs pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa gang gis 'tsho ba ste /
analyzed: yin pa dang / gang du skye ba dang / gang skye ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen gang dag gis yongs su zin pa dang / nye bar rton pas bsgrubs pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa gang gis 'tsho ba ste /
translated: It is the nature of birth, the place of birth, the one who is born, the causes and conditions that determine birth, the means of subsistence and the co-existent factors.

original: de ltar na 'di ni don mdor bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di ni don mdor bsdus pa yin no //
translated: This is the summary of the meaning of birth.

original: khyor ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: khyor ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a handful?

original: lus nyam chung bas khyor khyor ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: lus nyam chung bas khyor khyor ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is that by which a weak person can just barely eat.

original: skra dkar ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: skra dkar ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is gray hair?

original: skra'i mdog 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: skra'i mdog 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the change in the color of the hair.

original: gnyer ma mang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyer ma mang ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is wrinkled skin?

original: bags pa snyer snyer po gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: bags pa snyer snyer po gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the skin that is wrinkled.

original: rgas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rgas pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is old age?

original: 'dod pa la longs spyod pa'i mthu med cing /
analyzed: 'dod pa la longs spyod pa'i mthu med cing /
translated: It is the absence of power to enjoy pleasures.

original: gzi brjid nyams pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzi brjid nyams pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the decline of strength.

original: zhom pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: zhom pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is emaciation?

original: rang bzhin gyis nad bu can du gyur pa'i phyir brtsal bar bya ba la mthu med pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis nad bu can du gyur pa'i phyir brtsal bar bya ba la mthu med pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of power to act because of a natural weakness.

original: lus sme ba nag pos gang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: lus sme ba nag pos gang ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the body covered with moles and warts?

original: bzang ba la bgegs su gyur pa'i sme ba nag po mang du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: bzang ba la bgegs su gyur pa'i sme ba nag po mang du 'byung ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of many moles and warts which are inauspicious.

original: de la phyam sgur po ltar sgur ba dang mgul ba'i sgra ngar ngar po 'byung zhing dbugs brdzangs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la phyam sgur po ltar sgur ba dang mgul ba'i sgra ngar ngar po 'byung zhing dbugs brdzangs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the body bent like a roof beam, the voice hoarse and the breath stertorous?

original: 'gro ba'i spyod lam gyis phye ba'i lus kyi dbyibs dang / de las byung ba'i snga ma bas che ba nyid gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i spyod lam gyis phye ba'i lus kyi dbyibs dang / de las byung ba'i snga ma bas che ba nyid gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the shape of the body which is distinguished by the deportment of walking, and the voice which is distinguished by the sound of speech.

original: lus mdun du dbyibs sgur por gyur pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: lus mdun du dbyibs sgur por gyur pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the body bent forward?

original: 'dug pa'i spyod lam du gnas pa'i lus sgur ba nyid gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dug pa'i spyod lam du gnas pa'i lus sgur ba nyid gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the crookedness of the body in the sitting posture.

original: khar ba la brten pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: khar ba la brten pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the support of the stick?

original: 'greng ba'i spyod lam gyis gnas pa khar bas stobs bskyed pas gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'greng ba'i spyod lam gyis gnas pa khar bas stobs bskyed pas gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the support of the body by means of the stick in the standing posture.

original: mi gsal bar gyur pa gang zhe na /üîΩgnyid log pa'i spyod lam gyis gnas pa na /
analyzed: mi gsal bar gyur pa gang zhe na / gnyid log pa'i spyod lam gyis gnas pa na /
translated: What is the state of being unclear?

original: rgyun du gnyid stug pos non pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du gnyid stug pos non pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the state of being overcome by deep sleep in the lying posture.

original: zhan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: zhan pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the state of being weak?

original: de nyid las myur du sad pa'i mthu med pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid las myur du sad pa'i mthu med pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of the power to get up quickly from that state.

original: nyams pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: nyams pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the state of being lost?

original: dran pa'i blo nyams pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i blo nyams pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the loss of the faculty of memory.

original: yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the state of being regressed?

original: dran pa'i blo zhan pas dge ba'i chos yang dag par sgrub pa'i mthu med pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i blo zhan pas dge ba'i chos yang dag par sgrub pa'i mthu med pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of the power to accomplish the good on account of the weakness of the faculty of memory.

original: dbang po rnams yongs su smin pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po rnams yongs su smin pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the ripening of the faculties?

original: rang bzhin gyis zhan par gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis zhan par gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the weakness of the faculties by nature.

original: yongs su 'bral ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: yongs su 'bral ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the state of being deprived?

original: yul de dag nyid la mthu med par gyur pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yul de dag nyid la mthu med par gyur pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the fact that these same objects no longer have any power.

original: 'du byed rnams rnyings par gyur pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams rnyings par gyur pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the aging of formations?

original: 'chir nye ba'i phyir de dag nyid kyi tha ma'i dus @108b skabs la bab pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'chir nye ba'i phyir de dag nyid kyi tha ma'i dus @108b skabs la bab pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the fact that these same formations, at the end of their development, are in a state of decline because of death.

original: gtugs par gyur pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gtugs par gyur pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is their wearing out?

original: bya ba byed pa la mthu med bar gyur ba'i phyir //üîΩtshe yongs su zad pa na /
analyzed: bya ba byed pa la mthu med bar gyur ba'i phyir // tshe yongs su zad pa na /
translated: It is the fact that they are no longer fit for action.üîΩWhat is their destruction?

original: lus 'jig tu cha ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: lus 'jig tu cha ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the fact that, at the end of life, the body is abandoned.

original: rga ba'i don mdor bsdu ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: rga ba'i don mdor bsdu ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the summary of aging?

original: lus yongs su 'gyur ba dang / skra yang yongs su 'gyur ba dang / rgyas pa yongs su 'gyur ba dang / gzi brjid dang nyams stobs yongs su 'gyur ba dang / nad med pa yongs su 'gyur ba dang / mdog yongs su 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: lus yongs su 'gyur ba dang / skra yang yongs su 'gyur ba dang / rgyas pa yongs su 'gyur ba dang / gzi brjid dang nyams stobs yongs su 'gyur ba dang / nad med pa yongs su 'gyur ba dang / mdog yongs su 'gyur ba dang /
translated: It is the change in the body, the change in the complexion, the change in strength, the change in life, the change in memory, the change in sight, the change in action, the change in speech, the change in thought.

original: spyod lam yongs su 'gyur ba dang / dbang po gzugs can ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba dang / dbang po gzugs can yongs su 'gyur ba dang / gnas skabs 'das pa dang / tshe'i mjug brtul ba ni don gyis mdor bsdu ba yin bar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: spyod lam yongs su 'gyur ba dang / dbang po gzugs can ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba dang / dbang po gzugs can yongs su 'gyur ba dang / gnas skabs 'das pa dang / tshe'i mjug brtul ba ni don gyis mdor bsdu ba yin bar blta bar bya'o //
translated: The transformation of the mode of activity, the transformation of the non-material faculties, the transformation of the material faculties, the passing away of the state, and the end of life are to be regarded as the summary meaning of this.

original: sems can de dang de dag ces bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: sems can de dang de dag ces bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of ‚Äúthose sentient beings‚Äù?

original: sems can dmyal ba pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is the sentient beings in the hells, etc.

original: sems can gyi ris gang zhe na /
analyzed: sems can gyi ris gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of ‚Äúclass of sentient beings‚Äù?

original: de dag thams cad nyid do //
analyzed: de dag thams cad nyid do //
translated: It is all of them.

original: 'chi 'pho ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'chi 'pho ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of ‚Äúdeath‚Äù?

original: sems can gang dag gnad chad pa med par 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: sems can gang dag gnad chad pa med par 'chi ba'o //
translated: It is the death of sentient beings whose vital parts are not destroyed.

original: 'chi ba nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'chi ba nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of ‚Äúdeath itself‚Äù?

original: sems can gang dag gnad chad de 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: sems can gang dag gnad chad de 'chi ba'o //
translated: It is the death of sentient beings whose vital parts are destroyed.

original: 'bral ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'bral ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of ‚Äúseparation‚Äù?

original: lus las rnam par shes pa 'bral ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: lus las rnam par shes pa 'bral ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the separation of consciousness from the body.

original: med par 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: med par 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of ‚Äúdisappearance‚Äù?

original: dbang po gzugs can 'gags pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po gzugs can 'gags pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the cessation of the material faculties.

original: tshe nyams pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: tshe nyams pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of ‚Äúexhaustion of life‚Äù?

original: skyigs bu dang rngam par gyur pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: skyigs bu dang rngam par gyur pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the state of the body when it is no longer able to move.

original: drod yal ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: drod yal ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the state of the body when it is no longer able to retain heat?

original: g-yo ba med par gyur pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yo ba med par gyur pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the state of the body when it is no longer able to move.

original: phung po rnams spangs shing srog gi dbang po 'gags pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: phung po rnams spangs shing srog gi dbang po 'gags pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the state of the body when the aggregates are abandoned and the life faculty ceases?

original: dus su 'chi ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dus su 'chi ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the time of death.

original: 'chi ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'chi ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is death?

original: de'i rkyen dag gis dus lam bab par 'chi 'pho ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rkyen dag gis dus lam bab par 'chi 'pho ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the moment of death when the conditions are present.

original: 'chi ba'i dus byed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus byed pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the moment of death?

original: ring por mi thogs par 'chi ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ring por mi thogs par 'chi ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the state of the body when death is imminent.

original: rnam grangs gzhan yang 'chi ba ni bdud kyi las te /
analyzed: rnam grangs gzhan yang 'chi ba ni bdud kyi las te /
translated: There is another explanation: death is the action of Mara.

original: 'chi ba'i dus byed ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus byed ces bya ba yin no //
translated: The moment of death is the moment of death.

original: 'chi ba'i don mdor bsdu ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i don mdor bsdu ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of death in brief?

original: 'chi 'pho ba gang yin pa dang / chos gang 'chi 'pho ba dang / ji ltar 'chi 'pho ba dang / shi 'phos pa de'i mjug thogs kyi dus gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'chi 'pho ba gang yin pa dang / chos gang 'chi 'pho ba dang / ji ltar 'chi 'pho ba dang / shi 'phos pa de'i mjug thogs kyi dus gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is death, the thing that dies, the manner in which it dies, and the state immediately after death.

original: 'di ni don gyis mdor bsdu ba yin no //üîΩde ltar na 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i @109a * //
analyzed: 'di ni don gyis mdor bsdu ba yin no // de ltar na 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i @109a * //
translated: This is the meaning in brief.üîΩThus, this is the analysis of dependent origination.

original: rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam par dbye ba yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam par dbye ba yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: It should be understood in this way.

original: ci'i phyir ma rig pa la sogs pa srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi rim pa 'di lta bur bstan par byas she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma rig pa la sogs pa srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi rim pa 'di lta bur bstan par byas she na /
translated: Why are the members of existence beginning with ignorance taught in this order?

original: thog mkho nar shes bya'i dngos po la rmongs so //
analyzed: thog mkho nar shes bya'i dngos po la rmongs so //
translated: At the beginning, one is confused about the thing that is to be known.

original: rmongs pa de nyid las log par mngon par 'du byed do //
analyzed: rmongs pa de nyid las log par mngon par 'du byed do //
translated: From that very confusion, one wrongly forms.

original: log par mngon par 'du byed pas /
analyzed: log par mngon par 'du byed pas /
translated: From the wrong formation,

original: sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro //
translated: the mind becomes perverted.

original: sems phyin ci log tu gyur pas nying mtshams sbyor ro //üîΩnying mtshams sbyor pas dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems phyin ci log tu gyur pas nying mtshams sbyor ro // nying mtshams sbyor pas dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: From the perverted mind, one conceives.üîΩFrom conception, the faculties are perfected.

original: dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa las gnyis kyis yul yongs su longs spyod par byed do /
analyzed: dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa las gnyis kyis yul yongs su longs spyod par byed do /
translated: From the perfection of the faculties, one experiences objects through the two.

original: yul yongs su longs spyad pa las lhag par zhen pa dang / de 'dod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul yongs su longs spyad pa las lhag par zhen pa dang / de 'dod par 'gyur ro //
translated: and from the enjoyment of objects, attachment arises.

original: 'dod nas yongs su tshol bas nyon mongs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod nas yongs su tshol bas nyon mongs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: From attachment, there is the search for objects.

original: nyon mongs pa bsags pas yang srid par sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i las kun nas ldang ngo //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa bsags pas yang srid par sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i las kun nas ldang ngo //
translated: From the accumulation of afflictions, there is the arising of actions that are attractive and unattractive in the next existence.

original: las bsags pa kun nas langs pas 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub po //
analyzed: las bsags pa kun nas langs pas 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub po //
translated: From the arising of the accumulation of actions, there is the manifestation of suffering in the five destinies of cyclic existence.

original: sdug bsngal mngon par grub par byas pas /
analyzed: sdug bsngal mngon par grub par byas pas /
translated: From the manifestation of suffering,

original: rga shi la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal ba lus yongs su 'gyur ba'i rga shi'i sdug bsngal 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rga shi la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal ba lus yongs su 'gyur ba'i rga shi'i sdug bsngal 'byung ngo //
translated: there is the suffering of the transformation of the body, such as old age, death, and so on.

original: yul yongs su gyur pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni /
analyzed: yul yongs su gyur pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni /
translated: The suffering that arises from the transformation of objects is

original: mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal yin te /
analyzed: mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal yin te /
translated: grief, lamentation, pain, mental anguish, and disturbance.

original: de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag go rims kyis bstan to //
analyzed: de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag go rims kyis bstan to //
translated: Therefore, the Lord taught these twelve members in this order.

original: go rims kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las brtsams pa'i rkyen rnam pa gnyis yod de /
analyzed: go rims kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las brtsams pa'i rkyen rnam pa gnyis yod de /
translated: Another enumeration of the order: in the teaching on dependent origination, there are two kinds of conditions:

original: lus kyi rkyen dang / yul la nye bar spyod pa'i rkyen to //
analyzed: lus kyi rkyen dang / yul la nye bar spyod pa'i rkyen to //
translated: conditions for the body and conditions for the enjoyment of objects.

original: lus kyi rkyen yang yan lag drug gis bsdus shing yul las longs spyad pa'i rkyen yang yan lag drug kho nas bsdus te /
analyzed: lus kyi rkyen yang yan lag drug gis bsdus shing yul las longs spyad pa'i rkyen yang yan lag drug kho nas bsdus te /
translated: The conditions for the body are included in six members, and the conditions for the enjoyment of objects are also included in six members.

original: thog mar ni lus la bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pas rmongs so //
analyzed: thog mar ni lus la bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pas rmongs so //
translated: First, one is confused by the notion of self in the body, etc.

original: de nas las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa /
analyzed: de nas las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa /
translated: Then, not knowing that the result of actions is

original: sdug bsngal bar 'gyur bar ma shes nas las byed do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal bar 'gyur bar ma shes nas las byed do //
translated: painful, one performs actions.

original: byas nas kyang de nyid la shas cher rjes su rtog ste /
analyzed: byas nas kyang de nyid la shas cher rjes su rtog ste /
translated: Having performed them, one thinks about them again and again.

original: grogs rnam @109b par shes pa de dang ldan pa'i las kyis phyi ma la dbang po 'grub pas bsdus pa dang / de yongs su rdzogs pas bsdus pa dang / yul la longs spyod pas bsdus pas ming dang gzugs dang / reg pa la thug pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum mngon par 'grub par byed do //
analyzed: grogs rnam @109b par shes pa de dang ldan pa'i las kyis phyi ma la dbang po 'grub pas bsdus pa dang / de yongs su rdzogs pas bsdus pa dang / yul la longs spyod pas bsdus pas ming dang gzugs dang / reg pa la thug pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum mngon par 'grub par byed do //
translated: The action of possessing the consciousness of form as a friend is included in the establishment of the faculties in the next life, and is included in their completion, and is included in the enjoyment of objects.

original: tshe 'di nyid la yang reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sred pa bskyed pa dang / brtsal ba'i sgo dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i sgo dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi sgo dang / thar ba'i sgo nas 'dod pa yongs su tshol ba'am /
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la yang reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sred pa bskyed pa dang / brtsal ba'i sgo dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i sgo dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi sgo dang / thar ba'i sgo nas 'dod pa yongs su tshol ba'am /
translated: In this very life, the condition of contact produces the craving for feeling, and the search for pleasure is generated by the door of seeking, by the door of gain and honor, by the door of moral discipline and asceticism, and by the door of liberation.

original: lus yongs su tshol ba'am /
analyzed: lus yongs su tshol ba'am /
translated: Or, the search for pleasure is the search for the body.

original: thar pa yongs su tshol ba'ang rung ste /
analyzed: thar pa yongs su tshol ba'ang rung ste /
translated: Or, the search for pleasure is the search for liberation.

original: yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i rkyen dang ldan pa'i yongs su tshol ba byed do /
analyzed: yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i rkyen dang ldan pa'i yongs su tshol ba byed do /
translated: The search for pleasure is the search that is accompanied by the condition of the enjoyment of objects.

original: log par yongs su tshol ba byed pa nyon mongs pa rnams dang / de sngon du 'gro ba'i las rnams byas nas /
analyzed: log par yongs su tshol ba byed pa nyon mongs pa rnams dang / de sngon du 'gro ba'i las rnams byas nas /
translated: Having committed the actions which are the cause of the defilements, the false searches,

original: 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar skye'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar skye'o //
translated: one is born in the five destinies of transmigration.

original: skyes nas kyang rga zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyes nas kyang rga zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And, once born, one grows old and dies.

original: go rims kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang /
analyzed: go rims kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang /
translated: Another enumeration of the members in a different order:

original: sems can gyi tshogs gsum yod de /
analyzed: sems can gyi tshogs gsum yod de /
translated: There are three groups of sentient beings:

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa 'dod pa rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i dag pa 'dod pa rnams dang / yul lhur 'dzin pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa 'dod pa rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i dag pa 'dod pa rnams dang / yul lhur 'dzin pa rnams so //
translated: those who desire the supramundane pure state, those who desire the mundane pure state, and those who are attached to objects.

original: de la dang po rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs kyis ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gog par byed la 'phel bar ni mi byed do //
analyzed: de la dang po rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs kyis ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gog par byed la 'phel bar ni mi byed do //
translated: The first group, by the power of the pure side, stops dependent origination and does not increase it.

original: sems can gnyis pa rnams ni bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes su zin kyang /
analyzed: sems can gnyis pa rnams ni bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes su zin kyang /
translated: The second group, even though they do not know the truths as they are,

original: dran pa la nye bar gnas shing /
analyzed: dran pa la nye bar gnas shing /
translated: are established in mindfulness.

original: bsod nams dang / mi g-yo ba zag pa dang bcas pa bsgom pa las byung ba'i las byas pa'am /
analyzed: bsod nams dang / mi g-yo ba zag pa dang bcas pa bsgom pa las byung ba'i las byas pa'am /
translated: It is the karma that is produced by the cultivation of either merit or the immovable karma that is associated with outflows.

original: dran pa la nye bar gnas pa ma yin du zin kyang /üîΩbsod nams ma yin pa la 'gyod pas yongs su bsgos pa'am /
analyzed: dran pa la nye bar gnas pa ma yin du zin kyang / bsod nams ma yin pa la 'gyod pas yongs su bsgos pa'am /
translated: Or, even if one is not established in mindfulness,üîΩone is still greatly established in the mind that is suffused with regret for non-merit,

original: 'gyod pa med pa la mchog tu dga' bas yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas te /
analyzed: 'gyod pa med pa la mchog tu dga' bas yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas te /
translated: or the mind that is suffused with supreme joy for the absence of regret.

original: des na snga ma bzhin du phyi ma la skye ba'i gnas tha ma dang / 'bring dang / khyad par du 'phags pa dag tu mthar gyis ming dang gzugs nas reg pa la thug pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na snga ma bzhin du phyi ma la skye ba'i gnas tha ma dang / 'bring dang / khyad par du 'phags pa dag tu mthar gyis ming dang gzugs nas reg pa la thug pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, as before, in the future, the three types of suffering will be actualized in the three types of birth states, the inferior, the middling, and the superior, up to name-and-form and contact.

original: sems can gsum pa da ltar byung ba'i yul la longs spyod pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la gnas pa rnams kyi ni /
analyzed: sems can gsum pa da ltar byung ba'i yul la longs spyod pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la gnas pa rnams kyi ni /
translated: For the third type of sentient being, who is presently abiding in the feeling that arises from the enjoyment of objects,

original: snga ma bzhin du yan lag drug po @110a * //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du yan lag drug po @110a * //
translated: the six limbs, as before,

original: gzhan / sred pa nas rga shi la thug pa rnams rim gyis 'byung bar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan / sred pa nas rga shi la thug pa rnams rim gyis 'byung bar blta bar bya'o //
translated: and so on up to old age and death.

original: ci'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba /
translated: Why is dependent origination taught in reverse order,

original: rga shi nas bzung ste /üîΩlugs las bzlog pa'i go rims su bstan zhe na /
analyzed: rga shi nas bzung ste / lugs las bzlog pa'i go rims su bstan zhe na /
translated: beginning with old age and death?

original: bden pa'i tshul bstan pa'i dbang du byas pa yin te /
analyzed: bden pa'i tshul bstan pa'i dbang du byas pa yin te /
translated: It is taught in this order in order to demonstrate the truth of suffering.

original: 'di ltar skye ba dang rga shi ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pas rab tu phye ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar skye ba dang rga shi ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pas rab tu phye ba yin no //
translated: Birth and old age and death are distinguished by the truth of suffering.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ming dang gzugs la 'gag pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos ni dgu'o zhes gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ming dang gzugs la 'gag pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos ni dgu'o zhes gang gsungs pa /
translated: The Lord has said, ‚ÄúNine factors precede the cessation of name-and-form.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir ma rig pa 'gag pa sngon du 'gro ba zhes ma gsungs she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma rig pa 'gag pa sngon du 'gro ba zhes ma gsungs she na /
translated: Why did he not say that the cessation of ignorance precedes?

original: sems rnam par grol ba rnams la de 'dogs par mdzad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sems rnam par grol ba rnams la de 'dogs par mdzad pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because he designated the cessation of name-and-form as the cessation of the mind.

original: de dag gi tshe 'di la sa bon du gyur pa dang / tshe phyi ma la 'bras bur gyur pa'i ming dang gzugs nas tshor ba la thug pa'i bar du /
analyzed: de dag gi tshe 'di la sa bon du gyur pa dang / tshe phyi ma la 'bras bur gyur pa'i ming dang gzugs nas tshor ba la thug pa'i bar du /
translated: Name-and-form, which is the seed in this life and the result in the next life, up to the cessation of feeling,

original: mi skye ba'i 'gog pas 'gag par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mi skye ba'i 'gog pas 'gag par 'gyur zhing /
translated: It ceases through the cessation that is not a result of deliberation.üîΩAnd it ceases through the cessation that is a result of deliberation, because when one experiences a feeling in this life, the latent impressions of craving are destroyed.

original: tshe 'di la yang tshor ba myong ba na sred pa'i bag la nyal kun tu bcom pa'i phyir /üîΩmi 'jug pas 'gag par 'gyur la /üîΩde 'gags pas de sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag rnams 'gag par 'gyur te /
